summary: vanessa santillan 's body was found in a # 400,000 flat in fulham , south west london , at the end of march . the 33-year-old mexican national , who worked as a transgender escort , died as a result of injuries to the head and neck . her body was found in a flat in fulham having been strangled and beaten to death .

aspect: 1) A 23-year-old man was arrested in connection to the murder of transgender escort Vanessa Santillan, who was strangled and beaten to death in a £400k flat in southwest London last month; he has been bailed and told to return for questioning later.
2) Scotland Yard is appealing to anyone who had contact with Vanessa Santillan in the hours before her death, while police stated they will do everything to solve the case.
3) Vanessa Santillan, a 33-year-old Mexican national, had moved to London from Mexico and worked as a transgender escort in London, Paris, and Miami, according to her website.
